data.comment: Today's referee, Richard Martens, has blown to start the match.
Oliver Batista Meier for Heerenveen has been booked by Richard Martens and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 19, Willem II's Pol Llonch has been booked in Heerenveen.
Lucas Woudenberg puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Arjen Van Der Heide with an assist there.
In the minute 32, At Abe Lenstra Stadion, Miquel Nelom has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Gorkem Saglam (Willem II) has received a yellow card from Richard Martens.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Johnny Jansen (Heerenveen) is making a first substitution, with Couhaib Driouech replacing Ibrahim Dresevic.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Victor Van den Bogert is replacing Mats Kohlert for Willem II at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
In the minute 68, Arjen Van Der Heide for Heerenveen has been booked by Richard Martens and receives a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Couhaib Driouech with Sieben Dewaele. This is the second substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
Heerenveen make their third substitution with Rami Hajal replacing Oliver Batista Meier.
In the minute 75, The away team replace Derrick Kohn with Paul Gladon.
Goal! Pawel Bochniewicz extends Heerenveen lead to 2-0 with a header.
Great play from Joey Veerman to set up the goal.
In the minute 87, Adrie Koster is making the team's third substitution at Abe Lenstra Stadion with Jasper Dahlhaus replacing Gorkem Saglam.
The away team have replaced Dries Saddiki with Wesley Spieringhs. This is the fourth substitution made today by Adrie Koster.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
